_sText:
In this map, I wanted to recreate the atmosphere of the classic fy_iceworld of CS1.6 in a de_ map with some uniques ideas, like an intrusion 
detection systeme on one of bomb spot and a blizzard. I take my inspiration in some COD map and movies for make an coherent map.


This version of the map is an alpha non textured map with some bug but totally playable.

The map is only make with wall and entity require for the final gameplay. (decoration object will be add in textured final version)

You can play with bot if you want. But the bot reaction is very stupid in some case (like rush only middle)


PS: for installation, a txt file is in the zip

/!\MAP BY DIABL0/!\
